articles.author: The Guardian
articles.title: Trump unveils $500bn joint AI venture between OpenAI, Oracle and SoftBank
articles.description: Dubbed Stargate, it aims to construct data centers and infrastructure needed to power AI development
articles.content:
Donald Trump has unveiled what he called “the largest AI infrastructure project in history” – a $500bn joint venture between OpenAI, Oracle and SoftBank that aims to build a network of data centres across the US.
The new partnership, dubbed Stargate,... [1893 chars]

articles.title: As Trump renews tariff threat, Alberta Premier Danielle Smith calls for diplomacy, not retaliation
articles.description: As U.S. President Donald Trump renews his tariff threat on Canadian products, Alberta Premier Danielle Smith says diplomacy, not retaliation, is the best way for the country to stifle the risk of punishing new trade sanctions.
articles.content:

articles.title: Trump in favor of Elon Musk or Larry Ellison buying TikTok
articles.description: President Donald Trump said he is in favor of Elon Musk or Larry Ellison buying TikTok as he offered his latest thinking on what a deal might look like to save the US operations of the social media platform.

articles.author: Variety
articles.title: 24.6 Million Viewers, Down From 2021, 2017
articles.description: 24.6 million viewers watched Donald Trump's second presidential inauguration, down 27% from 2021 and 21% from 2017.
articles.content:
An average of 24.6 million viewers watched Donald Trump‘s inauguration as the 47th president of the United States on Monday per Nielsen.
That’s a lower total than what was achieved by both of the two most recent inauguration broadcasts: 27% below the... [1731 chars]

articles.title: Trump says he’s open to Musk or Ellison buying TikTok
articles.description: President Donald Trump said he’s open to billionaire friends Elon Musk or Larry Ellison buying TikTok as part of a joint venture meant to save the app from a ban.
articles.content:
President Donald Trump says he’d be open to his buddies Elon Musk or Larry Ellison buying TikTok.

articles.title: 'Appalling': Current and former prosecutors lament Trump's Jan. 6 pardons
articles.description: On the first anniversary of the Jan. 6 riot, then-Attorney General Merrick Garland tried to convey the enormous scope of the law enforcement effort to bring the rioters to justice, calling it “one of the largest, most complex and most resource-intensive investigations in our history.”

articles.title: Malaysia central bank, Trump tariff concerns
articles.description: Investors will be looking out for Malaysia's central bank policy meeting today, where it's expected to keep its policy rate steady at 3%.
articles.content:
Asia-Pacific markets traded mixed Wednesday, with China stocks declining after President Donald Trump's comments on imposing a 10% tariff on China.
Australia's S&P/ASX 200 rose 0.33% to close at 8,429.8.
